repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: This forked repository from bitcoin/bitcoin will be fully commented(for chinese). But there is never a pull request to official repository, because it will be only used to help you read code.

events.body: @qshuai It is actually intended to be 'txo'. Cache entries can refer to spent or unspent transaction outputs.

comments.body: It's `unsigned int CCoinsViewCache::GetCacheSize()` so it should be `%uutxo`.
Thanks! There are some `%u` in the code though.
@promag Yes, doesn't matter. tinyformat doesn't care about the format specifier; it always converts values based on their data type.
